generated_doNotEdit.title: Float Wander Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the mob to float around like the Ghast.

fields.title: Additional Collision Buffer
fields.description: If true, the mob will have an additional buffer zone around it to avoid collisions with blocks when picking a position to wander to.

fields.title: Allow Navigating Through Liquids
fields.description: If true allows the mob to navigate through liquids on its way to the target position.

fields.title: Float Duration
fields.description: Range of time in seconds the mob will float around before landing and choosing to do something else

fields.title: Float Wander Has Move Control
fields.description: If true, the MoveControl flag will be added to the behavior which means that it can no longer be active at the same time as other behaviors with MoveControl.

fields.title: Must Reach
fields.description: If true, the point has to be reachable to be a valid target

fields.title: Navigate Around Surface
fields.description: If true, will prioritize finding random positions in the vicinity of surfaces, i.e. blocks that are not Air or Liquid.

fields.title: Random Reselect
fields.description: If true, the mob will randomly pick a new point while moving to the previously selected one

fields.title: Surface Xz Dist
fields.description: The horizontal distance in blocks that the goal will check for a surface from a candidate position. Only valid when `navigate_around_surface` is true.

fields.title: Surface y Dist
fields.description: The vertical distance in blocks that the goal will check for a surface from a candidate position. Only valid when `navigate_around_surface` is true.

fields.title: Use Home Position Restriction
fields.description: If true, the mob will respect home position restrictions when choosing new target positions. If false, it will choose target position without considering home restrictions

fields.title: Xz Dist
fields.description: Distance in blocks on ground that the mob will look for a new spot to move to. Must be at least 1

fields.title: y Dist
fields.description: Distance in blocks that the mob will look up or down for a new spot to move to. Must be at least 1

fields.title: y Offset
fields.description: Height in blocks to add to the selected target position

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
